title: Preface to a life
creator_credit: William S Resnick, Samuel A Datlowe and Sun Dial Films
brief_description: Shows parental influence on a child’s personality. This is illustrated in a series of episodes which show the effects of an overly solicitous mother and a father who demands too much. For contrast, the film shows the healthy childhood which results when both parents accept their child as an individual with unique characteristics and potentials.
